title: Newer versions of RFB not supported in vncsharp
author: truefriend-cz
body_snippet:
----------
ErrorMsg
11/22/2020 05:09:23
Unable to connect to the server. Error was: Only versions 3.3, 3.7, and 3.8 of the RFB Protocol are supported.
----------

iterations.description: Newer RFB protocol versions are not supported by the current VncSharpCore implementation, leading to compatibility issues with modern VNC servers.

comments.author: VShawn
comments.snippet:
VncSharp has been archived, no update for years.

https://github.com/humphd/VncSharp

comments.author: Laim
comments.snippet:
There is actually an open issue already for this that was updated when VncSharp was archived. 

#494 

It does have a possible fix at the bottom of it as well.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Newer RFB protocol versions are not supported by the current VncSharpCore implementation, leading to compatibility issues with modern VNC servers.
Approach: Investigate upgrading VncSharpCore or implementing workarounds/patches within Connection.Protocol.VNC.cs to support newer RFB protocol versions.
